title: Software Engineer
subtitle: DID.coop
description: Developed cross-domain data portability for the Hollo ActivityPub server, enabling smooth user migration (profiles, posts, followers) across federated servers.
Built secure export/import features with Hono, Bun, PostgreSQL, and Drizzle ORM; incorporated wallet-linked encrypted storage.
Created a CLI tool for validating Activity Streams 2.0 tarball files, ensuring protocol compliance and reliable data processing.
Utilized Sentry for debugging and error tracking, helping identify and resolve issues in production environments more efficiently.

title: Fullstack Web Developer

Ensured robust application performance and security, contributing to the project's success in the evolving landscape of web3 solutions.
